title: Update PhonePe UPI ID and hide it in UI

requirements.text: Update the PhonePe payment UPI ID from the current value to '9392412728-2@axl' in the backend payment configuration

quotes: To add a phonepay payment are send to this UPI id add for subscription option 9392412728-2@axl

acceptanceCriteria: The backend stores and uses '9392412728-2@axl' as the UPI ID for PhonePe payments
Payment deep links and QR codes are generated with the new UPI ID

requirements.text: Hide or obscure the UPI ID in the frontend payment UI, displaying only partial digits or a masked version instead of showing the full UPI ID '9392412728-2@axl'
acceptanceCriteria: The UPI ID is not displayed in full plain text in the PaymentQRSection component
Users can still complete payments via QR code or deep link without seeing the complete UPI ID
The payment flow remains functional with the masked UPI ID display

constraints: Maintain existing PhonePe payment functionality including QR code generation and deep link creation
Do not modify the payment confirmation or payment history features
nonGoals: Changing the payment amount or subscription duration
Adding new payment methods beyond PhonePe
